definition: an ornamental coating to an object consisting of a thin layer of superior wood glued to a base of inferior wood, to cover with veneer
details:
noun
- an ornamental coating to an object consisting of a thin layer of superior wood glued to a base of inferior wood
= example: an ornamental coating to an object consisting of a thin layer of superior wood glued to a base of inferior wood
verb
- to cover with veneer
= example: to cover with veneer
